text:
@realDonaldTrump @lgutwein99_31 Donald Trump considers the following Success:

1. 98,787 Dead Americans since March-28% of the world total
2. 1.7 million Americans Citizens have tested positive for COVID-19 -over 30% of positive cases in world

Voter will make their definition of success very clear in November
